conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion checks passed successfully.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation with clear height, thickness, and volume. The angled view is perfect, and the roof is cleanly removed.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration, wall positions, and proportions are highly accurate. Doors are present and correctly placed, but windows are only partially represented as openings.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture, kitchen, and bathroom fixtures are present, correctly placed, and to scale.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity, good lighting, and aesthetic coherence. The background is clean. Minor reduction as the window 'frames' seem a bit uniform/stylized.

detected_errors.description: Windows are represented as openings but lack distinct frames or detailed sill/lintel compared to typical 3D models of windows. The 2D shows varied window styles/sizes which are simplified in 3D.

summary: This is an excellent and highly faithful 3D conversion of the 2D floor plan, demonstrating strong geometric accuracy and clear visualization of interior spaces.
